title: Jackson Confirmed as First Black Woman on U.S. Supreme Court
itunes:title: Jackson Confirmed as First Black Woman on U.S. Supreme Court
description:
Bloomberg News Legal Analyst June Grasso breaks the news that Judge Ketanji Brown Jackson is confirmed to the U.S. Supreme Court, making history as the first Black woman to ever join its ranks. Bloomberg News Finance Reporter Kat Chiglinsky discusses Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway purchasing a stake in HP valued at more than $4.2 billion. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Big Tech Team Leader Sarah Frier share the details of Sarah's Businessweek Magazine story Far Right Set the Terms of France’s Election One Meme at a Time. And we Drive to the Close with Katerina Simonetti, Senior Vice President at Morgan Stanley Private Wealth Management.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
